content: the zucca pumpkin is perfectly textured and easy to crochet with several finishing options this little pumpkin with bring your fall decor together get ready to crochet your own adorable zucca pumpkin with this easy-to-follow pattern perfect for beginners this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial to guide you through the process create charming pumpkins in two sizes small and large to add a touch of whimsy to your fall decor or gift to friends and family using brava worsted or brava tweed yarn from knit picks you ll enjoy working up these textured pumpkins with a simple half_double_crochet stitch pattern add a handmade touch to your home with these cute and customizable crochet pumpkins **unique features-** easy-to-follow written pattern with video tutorial create two sizes small 3 5 wide x 2 5 tall and large 6 wide x 4 tall textured crochet design adds depth and character to pumpkins made with high-quality brava worsted or brava tweed yarn perfect for beginners looking to enhance their crochet skills customizable colors and sizes to suit your style **materials needed-** scissors hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarns brava worsted worsted weight 25-45 yards brava tweed worsted weight 10-15 yards gauge 8 stitches by 4 row = 2 inches in half_double_crochet
